# Swiss Health MCP Server

> MCP server for Swiss health insurance premiums (Krankenkassen-Pr√§mien)

## What this server does

This MCP server provides AI assistants with access to 1.6 million Swiss health insurance premium records from 55 insurers spanning 2016-2026.

## Available tools

### get_cheapest_insurers
Find the top 5 cheapest health insurers for a specific profile.
- Required: canton, year, age_band, franchise_chf
- Optional: model_type, accident_covered

### compare_insurers  
Compare multiple insurers for a specific profile.
- Required: insurer_names (array), canton, year, age_band, franchise_chf

### get_price_history
Show price development of an insurer over multiple years.
- Required: insurer_name, canton, age_band, franchise_chf
- Optional: start_year, end_year

### get_database_stats
Show database statistics (entry counts, available years, insurers).

## Data source

BAG Priminfo (Swiss Federal Office of Public Health)
https://priminfo.admin.ch

## Parameters

- Cantons: AG, AI, AR, BE, BL, BS, FR, GE, GL, GR, JU, LU, NE, NW, OW, SG, SH, SO, SZ, TG, TI, UR, VD, VS, ZG, ZH
- Years: 2016-2026
- Age bands: child (0-18), young_adult (19-25), adult (26+)
- Franchises: 0, 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 600, 1000, 1500, 2000, 2500 CHF
- Models: standard, hmo, telmed, family_doctor, diverse

## Example prompts

- "What are the cheapest health insurers in Zurich for 2026?"
- "Compare CSS, Helsana and Swica in Bern"
- "How did Assura premiums develop from 2016 to 2026?"

## Installation

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "swiss-health": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "@remoprinz/swiss-health-mcp"]
    }
  }
}
```

https://github.com/remoprinz/swiss-health-mcp
